001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.ActivationsCachedNeuron;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentModelDecomposer;
012
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.stream.Stream;
018
019@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
020public class BackPropagation implements GradientDescentModelDecomposer<NeuralNetwork, Float> {
021
022    @Override
023    public Stream<GradientDecomposition<Float>> calculateDecompositionGradients(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Vector<Float> objectiveGradients, Float[] inputs) {
024        List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions = new ArrayList<>();
025        Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals = new IdentityHashMap<>();
026        for (int k = 0; k < neuralNetwork.coArity(); k++) {
027            decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForOutputNode(decompositions, neuralNetwork, objectiveGradients, errorSignals, k);
028        }
029        for (int l = neuralNetwork.getDepth() - 1; l >= 1; l--) {
030            int width = neuralNetwork.getWidth(l);
031            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
032                decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForHiddenNode(decompositions, neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
033            }
034        }
035        return decompositions.stream();
036    }
037
038    private static void decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForOutputNode(List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions, NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Vector<Float> objectiveGradients, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int j) {
039        ActivationsCachedNeuron outputNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(neuralNetwork.getDepth(), j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
040        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = outputNode.getCache().removeLast();
041
042        // determine error signal for output node
043        ActivationFunction activationFunction = outputNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction();
044        float errorSignal = objectiveGradients.get(j + 1) * activationFunction.determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
045        decompositions.add(decompose(outputNode.getNeuronFunction().getLinearCombination(), activation.inputs(), errorSignal));
046        errorSignals.put(outputNode, errorSignal);
047    }
048
049    private static void decomposeAndSetErrorSignalForHiddenNode(List<GradientDecomposition<Float>> decompositions, NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
050        ActivationsCachedNeuron hiddenNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(l, j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
051        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = hiddenNode.getCache().removeLast();
052
053        // determine error signal for hidden node using back propagation
054        float backPropagation = calculateBackPropagation(neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
055        ActivationFunction activationFunction = hiddenNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction();
056        float errorSignal = backPropagation * activationFunction.determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
057        decompositions.add(decompose(hiddenNode.getNeuronFunction().getLinearCombination(), activation.inputs(), errorSignal));
058        errorSignals.put(hiddenNode, errorSignal);
059    }
060
061    private static <N extends NeuralNetwork> float calculateBackPropagation(N neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
062        float backPropagation = 0.0f;
063        Map<Neuron, Float> downstreamNodes = neuralNetwork.getOutputConnections(l, j);
064        for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> entry : downstreamNodes.entrySet()) {
065            float downstreamWeight = entry.getValue();
066            float downstreamErrorSignal = errorSignals.getOrDefault(entry.getKey(), 0.0f);
067            backPropagation += downstreamErrorSignal * downstreamWeight;
068        }
069        return backPropagation;
070    }
071
072    private static GradientDecomposition<Float> decompose(LinearCombination<Float> linearCombination, Float[] inputs, float errorSignal) {
073        Float[] parameterGradients = new Float[inputs.length + 1];
074        parameterGradients[0] = errorSignal; // bias term
075        for (int d = 1; d < parameterGradients.length; d++) {
076            parameterGradients[d] = errorSignal * inputs[d - 1];
077        }
078        return new GradientDecomposition<>(linearCombination, new TypedVector<>(parameterGradients, true, linearCombination.getCurrentNumberType()));
079    }
080}
